description: Returns a list of parameter group descriptions. If a parameter group name is specified, the list will contain only the descriptions for that group.

parameters.name: ParameterGroupNames
parameters.description: The names of the parameter groups. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to include in the response. If more results exist than the specified MaxResults value, a token is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. The value for MaxResults must be between 20 and 100.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: ParameterGroups
nested_items.description: An array of parameter groups. Each element in the array represents one parameter group.

nested_items.name: ParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the parameter group.
